about_the_game:
Dicey Chess is a chess game in which the throw of the die decides how far you can move, adding a layer of unpredictability to every move.

Key Features

  • Highly Customizable

    • Die Ranges: Make the pawn be able to walk between 1 and 3 or even 1 and 7 cells by modifying its die.

    • Piece Types: Randomize the types of pieces you will be playing with. You could end up with 10 rooks or even 5 kings requiring your enemy to capture all of them to win.

    • Piece Movements: Randomize the way your pieces can move. Have the pawn move like a knight or the rook like a bishop. Even combinations are possible.

    • Turn Timer: Set your own pace with customizable turn timers. Or if you are feeling lucky you can also randomize it!

  • Play Anywhere: Challenge friends online or over a local network, or go up against a powerful Bot.
